page.title: 16SHOTTS FARMING
page.content: There is no arable or dairy farming in this area. Stock rearing is more suitable for the climate and geography. The farms individually employ only two or three workers. Farming land is mostly rough pasture. Cattle are more often to be seen than sheep.Hay and silage are made for winter feed.This year has been too wet for good hay crops ,but silage has done better. The cold very wet conditions have made life uncomfortable for the animals and a well drained piece of pasture has been helpful in the prevention of disease. Farmers will be asking the government for financial aid.
